Comment: Abilities: AHfs (Flame Strike), Researchubertip (Tooltip - Learn - Extended)
Value: Conjures a pillar of fire which damages ground units in a target area over time. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - 66 damage over 3 seconds, followed by 90 damage over 6 seconds. |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - 84 damage over 3 seconds, followed by 102 damage over 6 seconds. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - 99 damage over 3 seconds, followed by 120 damage over 6 seconds. |n|cffffcc00Level 4|r - 117 damage over 3 seconds, followed by 138 damage over 6 seconds.
